div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1731 Euhemeria (mod. Qasr el Banat), (407) 100 km. SW of Cairo, c. A.D. 28 Burial: 15-14 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: "60 silver drachmai." With jew- elry in box Late Ptolemaic (Cleopatra VII) ?: 15 tetradr.? Disposition: unknown Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Rylands Library at Manchester 2 (Manchester, 1915), no. 125 Hunt-Edgar, Select Papyri 2 (Loeb, 1934), p. 259
